long_description: The Eton BoostSolar Charger combines a solar panel with a battery pack, harnessing unlimited power from the sun to keep your mobile devices charged up when you're playing outside. When fully charged, the removable 5,000mAh lithium battery offers enough power to fully charge most smartphones twice or most tablets once. Standard USB port charges most smartphones; 2.1A USB port charges most mobile devices. Slim, rugged and splashproof rubber housing is ready to take on all kinds of outdoor adventures; fastener loops at each corner make it easy to secure the unit to a backpack. Battery charges in approximately 30 hrs. via the solar panel in direct sunlight, and in approximately 7 hrs. via AC power with the included micro USB cable. With the push of a button, LED charge indicators show you how much battery life remains. The Eton BoostSolar Charger comes with a micro USB cable, USB adapter and owner's manual.
short_description: The Eton BoostSolar Charger combines a solar panel with a battery pack, harnessing unlimited power from the sun to keep your mobile devices charged up when you're playing outside.
